title: Clubs
body: Hi. I have made a club and few days later there was that club bug happening for over a week. Now it's fixed, but I'm no longer in my own club that i made, but my friends still are. I don't have my club chat in client and i don't have club tag in game. Nobody can add me because they say I'm in club and I'm its maker. Is there anyone with same thing happening that can help me? Thanks. {{item:3073}}

replies.body:
We're aware of this issue and are working on a solution. I can't estimate an ETA on when this fix will roll out, but you can keep up with updates on this issue [here.](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/nMisJPK8-clubs-outage-oct-2016)

Let me know if you have any questions.
